title: Love and valour: celebrated in the person of the author, by the name of Adraste. Or, the divers affections of Minerva. One part of the unfained story of the true Lisander and Caliste. Translated out of the French by W.B.
author: Audiguier, Vital d', 1569-1624.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Thomas Slater, and are to be sold at his shop at the Swan in Duck Lane,
